resources.string: Lie on the bench with your eyes under the bar Grab the bar with a medium grip-width (thumbs around the bar!) Unrack the bar by straightening your arms Lower the bar to your mid-chest Press the bar back up until your arms are straight

Injuries during Bench Press muscles affected are anterior deltoids and pactorial major 

 • Cold Therapy- Apply an ice pack on your painful area for about 5-15 minutes for 3 days.

 • Apply heat pack for 10 minutes at your painful area after that.

 • Take over the counter drugs (OTC) nonsteroidal anti-inflammatary drugs( NAIDs ) such as Ibuprofen (Advil) and naproxen sodium (Aleve)

 • Avoid Physical activites for some time.
